description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Spiders! Why did it have to be spiders? Fast top down 2D dual stick shooter. Features global scoreboards.  Do you have what it takes to save the world from invading giant spiders?
description.short: Spiders! Why did it have to be spiders? Fast top down 2D dual stick shooter. Features global scoreboards.  Do you have what it takes to save the world from invading giant spiders?
